title: Maintaining trust in a technologized public sector
research_description: This paper provides a critical assessment of how potentially untrustworthy private technological systems, such as blockchain-based systems, affect trust in public sector institutions.
research_results: The findings highlight the need for risk-based policies to manage the trust challenges posed by the increasing reliance on blockchain and AI in the public sector.
future_research: Future research should focus on developing more robust frameworks for evaluating the trustworthiness of emerging technologies in public administration.
